description: I like the idea of having this functionality as an app rather than an extension. It's not clear what turning it on does though. It's called "No Sleep," so is sleep off when the app is on? Having sun and moon icons next to each other, with one highlighted, would be clearer.
Doesn't prevent my laptop from sleeping (Debian 12)
waste of time. activating it interrupted the copying process of some files I was doing
